response.answer_text: Recent polling shows the Mueller investigation will not really be a topic on voters’ minds for 2020. And honestly, by that point, it will have been over a year . People who like Trump weren’t going to change their views based on what the report said. People who don’t like Trump weren’t going to change their views based on what the report said. Dems know this and they know using report won’t help them win in 2020. I think these will be the leading topics HealthcareDrug pricingSouthern borderCurrent state of the economyThe trade war with ChinaCorporate lobbyingDem-specific:MarijuanaCollegeEnvironmental policyCorruption, vacancies, and ineffectiveness in the executive branchWealth inequalityGOP-specific:Good economyGood stock marketDems are weak on crime and national securityDems are socialistsI might be missing some stuff but these should be the big ones.

The issues that SHOULD be brought up in the next presidential election should be bringing manufacturing jobs back to the USA and providing a decent living wage for working Americans so that there will be LESS HOMELESSNESS and Fewer of our AMERICAN CITIZEN people going to an early grave because they could not afford necessary medical treatment and decent pensions and strengthening Social Security and Medicare so our senior AMERICAN citizens can live decently in their retirement years.
